title: Sražení k zemi

h2: Nepřátelé imunní vůči sražení k zemi
Nepřátelé odolní vůči sražení k zemi
Nepřátelé s malou odolností vůči oslepení sražení k zemi
content:
Sražení k zemi is a kritický efekt with the following characteristics:

Temporary sražení k zemi, i.e. knocking an opponent (or an opponent knocking Geralt) to the ground
When an enemy is knocked down, it prevents them from launching their next attack as quickly
Opponents can kill Geralt with one hit (a finishing blow), making this effect especially dangerous in combat against large, powerful beasts

Enemies who have less than 33% of their život left may be stunned and/or knocked down by any short weapon attack.
